name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: TL;DR: info is roughly 5 years old. Response time to service requests are good. Downtime is minimal. Bandwidth throughput is delivered reliably, but has high variance, which makes it ok for streaming, torrents but bad for applications that are sensitive to spikes and dips in bandwidth. Sub-optimal gaming experience.  Was a 2mbps user a few years back before switching back to pldt because of game problems.
